item.title: Custom Asidenotes
item.description: In which I turn inline asides into robustly enhanced sidenotes with CSS and just a touch of JS.

item.title: Comparing PlanetScale PostgreSQL with Hetzner Local Postgres
item.description: PlanetScale’s new $5 single-node PostgreSQL tier (PS-5) promises the same observability/maintenance story you get from their Vitess-backed MySQL side. I wanted to see how it feels next to the very boring Postgres instance I already pay for: a Hetzner CPX11 (2 vCPU / 2 GB RAM for €3.85) running in their eu-central region (Nuremberg). This isn’t even LAN vs internet—it’s literally local disk vs a remote region—so the goal is to get a sanity check, not crown a winner.

item.title: His Legal Name Is One Letter—The Airline Rejects It And Says 'Just Call Yourself AA,' Creating Chaos - View from the Wing
item.description: His legal first name is literally one letter: "A." But the airline won't accept it, forcing him to use "AA" instead. What might seem like a small detail is creating serious travel chaos—risking issues with passports, points transfers, security checks, and international flights.
item.author: (garyleff)
